entry.title: RIDDLE: Lightweight anti-Sybil with anonymity in Bitcoin
entry.summary: The author of this post suggests a protocol for anti-Sybil that aims to maintain a decent level of privacy without being too demanding for users. The suggested protocol is mainly focused on users or customers of websites or services, but it could also be useful in anti-Sybil measures for things like Lightning. The post includes several sections that can be easily navigated through the provided link. The post is signed by waxwing/AdamISZ and was sent using Proton Mail secure email.
